unsubscribe
 The EXEX platform shows the exhibition "Unsubscribe", by the artist Andres Gurwicz.
 By installing the extension, you'll be able to experience the full work, composed by 7 pieces. This app works for one week exactly, beginning the same moment of installing, and changes the featured material ones per day. After the 7th day, the app will be deleted automatically. 
 Contact the gallery: exexgallery@gmail.com
Developed by Amir Lellouche
